faq.q: Is street parking okay for pickup?
faq.a: Hosts will specify; most meet in public lots.
Book early and allow extra time downtown.
Follow pickup notes; allow time to clear snow/ice.
A temporary hold (e.g., $200–$300) is placed and released after return.
If the car is available—request in advance.
